example_sentence_italian: Una mattina ho trovato una lettera.
example_sentence_english: One morning I found a letter.
In the morning I drink coffee.

example_sentence_italian: Il profumo della mattina è buono.
example_sentence_english: The scent of the morning is pleasant.

notes: contraction of a + la; used to mean habitual 'in the morning'
example_sentence_english: In the morning I drink tea.

notes: contraction of da + la; indicates since/from
example_sentence_italian: Dalla mattina non ha più dormito.
example_sentence_english: He has not slept since the morning.
There was fog in the morning.

example_sentence_italian: Sulla mattina del concerto ero nervoso.
example_sentence_english: On the morning of the concert I was nervous.

example_sentence_italian: Con la mattina mi sento meglio.
example_sentence_english: In the morning I feel better.
